channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Copa Airlines eyes US loyalty opportunities, ‘fundamentals’ over ‘flashy’ seats and tech
item.description: Copa Airlines is making a big push to attract U.S. customers after a big expansion in North America.

item.title: Alaska cruise guide: Best itineraries, planning tips and things to do
item.description: Get ready to cruise Alaska: Here's everything you need to know about the best itineraries, ports of call and ships sailing the region, as well as key ...

item.title: Rakuten American Express review: One of the best ways to earn Membership Rewards points
item.description: If you're invested in the Membership Rewards program, you need to consider the Rakuten American Express card.

item.title: How much should I tip when I travel?
item.description: Even the most seasoned travelers may find that tipping while traveling can be an extremely complex and personal thing.

item.title: 'Winter is here' as first US ski resorts of the season open their lifts
item.description: The U.S. ski season is off to a fresh start, with Keystone and A-Basin opening this weekend.
